overview: O.K. partner, it's time for a real rope 'em, ride 'em, drive 'em sexual romp. Feel the power of superstar Tom Brock as he takes you and his buddy's T.J. Stryker, Steve Ross, and hunky hung Vladimir Correa on a down on your knees rodeo of lust. Experience it all in "They Grow 'Em Big" from Catalina Video.
tagline: HOT AND HORNY COWBOYS GETTING "DOWN" ON THE FARM
title: They Grow 'em Big
